goal.ch:
The purposes of this course are: 
- to help students understand the principle of demand and supply, market structure and decisions under risk in the field of managerial economics   
- to discuss the cases in practice
goal.en:
The purposes of this course are: 
- to help students understand the principle of demand and supply, market structure and decisions under risk in the field of managerial economics   
- to discuss the cases in practice

outline.ch:
1. 2023/10/21 Introduction and Demand
2. 2023/10/28 Supply and Group Presentation
3. 2023/11/04 Market Structure and Group Presentation
4. 2023/11/11 Preferences and Group Presentation
5. 2023/11/18 CEO Compensation and Adverse Selection
6. 2023/11/25 Term Paper Presentation
outline.en:
1. 2023/10/21 Introduction and Demand
2. 2023/10/28 Supply and Group Presentation
3. 2023/11/04 Market Structure and Group Presentation
4. 2023/11/11 Preferences and Group Presentation
5. 2023/11/18 CEO Compensation and Adverse Selection
6. 2023/11/25 Term Paper Presentation

textbook.ch:
All the notes can be accessed online

Reference:
Samuelson, W. F., Marks, S. G., & Zagorsky, J. L. (2021). Managerial economics. John Wiley & Sons.
方博亮、林祖嘉 (2021), 管理經濟學, 元照出版

gradMethod.ch:
Homework (individaul) 10%
Presentation (by group)
Document (30%); Oral (20%); Discussion (10%)
Term paper (by group) 20% 
Participation 10% 
Extra credit
Note: Low class participation combined with absences of more than 2 sessions can lead to a failing grade.
